data.text:
Traveling with Pets

Pets are allowed on the first floor arrivals area only. Pets must remain in their carrier while in the terminal. Please walk pets before boarding your flight. The Pet Exercise Area is located outside the terminal on the east end.

Space Required and Space Available Passengers

Please have pertinent documents (ID cards, Letters, Travel Orders, etc.) readily available

Please be travel ready with baggage and carry-on items. Passengers are reminded that baggage limitations are: 2 bags per individual, limited to 70 pounds max weight per bag and not to exceed the dimensions of 62 linear inches. Passengers may have one carry-on bag and one personal item, that must fit under any aircraft seat.

Unattended Baggage

All unattended bags will be confiscated. If you notice an unattended bag in the terminal, please notify a Passenger Service Agent.

Long-Term Parking

Long-term parking passes are available for up to 30 days. Please have vehicle tag number available. Long-term parking is in rows 9 & 10 only.
